item.title: अपां नपात्
item.description: Source: TW Subaqueous fire problem: A reflective thread. In the past I’ve tweeted on this topic which is essentially a highlight of textual evidences and my opinion and let readers draw their own conclusions. In contrast, this thread is an attempt at my reasoning in the form of FAQ. Problem What is the subaqueous fire or “fire in the water” problem? Rigveda talks about fire that’s from waters in numerous instances.
